Package io.mats3.localinspect

Mats3 tool that can output an embeddable HTML describing a MatsFactory and all its endpoints, as well as "local statistics", gathered using a Mats Interceptor.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LocalHtmlInspectForMatsFactory
    Will produce an "embeddable" HTML interface - notice that there are CSS (LocalHtmlInspectForMatsFactory.getStyleSheet(Appendable)), JavaScript (LocalHtmlInspectForMatsFactory.getJavaScript(Appendable)) and HTML (createFactoryReport(Appendable,..)) to include.
    LocalStatsMatsInterceptor.EndpointStats  
    LocalStatsMatsInterceptor.IncomingMessageRepresentation  
    LocalStatsMatsInterceptor.InitiatorStats  
    LocalStatsMatsInterceptor.MessageRepresentation  
    LocalStatsMatsInterceptor.OutgoingMessageRepresentation  
    LocalStatsMatsInterceptor.StageStats  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LocalHtmlInspectForMatsFactoryImpl
    Implementation of LocalHtmlInspectForMatsFactory.
    LocalStatsMatsInterceptor
    Interceptor that collects "local stats" for Initiators and Stages of Endpoints, which can be used in conjunction with a MatsFactory report generator, LocalHtmlInspectForMatsFactory.
    LocalStatsMatsInterceptor.EndpointStatsImpl  
    LocalStatsMatsInterceptor.IncomingMessageRepresentationImpl  
    LocalStatsMatsInterceptor.OutgoingMessageRepresentationImpl  

Package io.mats3.localinspect Description

Mats3 tool that can output an embeddable HTML describing a MatsFactory and all its endpoints, as well as "local statistics", gathered using a Mats Interceptor.

The HTML page is meant to be included in a Service's introspection facility if it has any.
